samples.question: So, what can we fix?
samples.transcript: First, there is the importance of staying calm during an exam. He wants you to not get nervous during the exam. Go into the exam feeling relaxed. do not let it shake. If you do not vibrate, your vocal output might be higher. Because the more clearly you can hear during the test, the higher the voltage will be. So I will try to practice speaking so that my voice does not tremble anymore.
samples.transcript_original: First, there's the importance of staying calm during an exam. He wants you to not get nervous during the exam. Go into the exam feeling relaxed. Don't let it shake. So I'll try to practice speaking so that my voice doesn't tremble anymore.

So I will try to practice speaking so that my voice does not tremble anymore.

samples.question: Are you an introvert or something?
samples.transcript: It depends. It depends. Well, actually, with only a week left, it is too difficult to improve, but after the exam, I will try to practice speaking in front of the camera and in front of crowds more. Now that there is no crowd, let us practice speaking in front of the camera. Once you have talked to the camera enough times, you will find that you do not get nervous anymore. that is because, generally speaking, it is just a skill. it is also quite difficult for me to say I am confident right away. I need time to practice this, so let us just consider it as practicing speaking in front of the camera after the exam to build my confidence.
samples.transcript_original: It depends . It depends . samples.question: Where are you, my dear?
samples.transcript: I am from Nghe An. Generally speaking, having a regional accent is a disadvantage. But the way you handle your voice is quite good. It was not purely from Nghe An, so it shattered into pieces, which is good. I am just improving it further. That voice change thing is really difficult. He really could not change his voice. He cannot change his voice. So, if you have already done it, that is great, and you should just try to improve further. it is a long journey, not something that can be accomplished in a day or two, so we just need to keep moving forward, keep selling as we please, and keep practicing. Yes, I guess it is probably not that difficult to achieve, but it is still possible if you handle it calmly. Now, you have to always think in your head that day you will be calm, you will definitely be relaxed, and when you are relaxed, you will be able to handle it, you will survive.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 1]

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 5]
samples.transcript: First do you think our classes are necessary and why I think our classes are very necessary it gives an ebony of expression for children to be able to express their greatest joys their deepest fears and a hope for the future and I think is really really important and has always been an outlet of expression for people to connect to people and I think that then is critically important because in life when we actually talk about the hard sciences that is why we spoke about earlier it is very hard to actually connect to people with science we use science to connect to people but and it is critically important because it is a common language that transcends cultures that can transcend religion that actually speak to people on a very emotive level and that is really really powerful yeah thank you what kinds of art do people in your country like I think we have different kinds of art that we have the traditional kinds of art we have a theater we have dance we have song we have instrumental music so I think that not being a very personal topic we do have different kinds of other people to enjoy but it means your subjective there is always something out there for somebody but it is not something that we can say definite of me that there is one form that supersedes all others okay and what benefits can you get from painting as a hobby personally I do not really paint myself but I have seen people who paint and I have seen that pieces of work before painting actually is an activity that can be done by different kinds of people from somebody who is a novice to somebody who is an expert as again if with all forms.

samples.question: Do you use technology a lot in your daily routine?
samples.transcript: >> I do use technology a lot in my daily routine. Yes. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: >> I do use technology a lot in my daily routine. Yes. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I do use technology a lot in my daily routine. Yes. >>

samples.question: What is the most useful gadget you own?
samples.transcript: >> The most useful gadget I own is the most useful gadget anyone owns at this point in time, which is a smartphone. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: >> The most useful gadget I own is the most useful gadget anyone owns at this point in time, which is a smartphone. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> The most useful gadget I own is the most useful gadget anyone owns at this point in time, which is a smartphone. >>

samples.question: Do you prefer using a laptop or a mobile phone?
samples.transcript: >> I prefer using a laptop over a mobile phone. it is much more convenient. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_original: >> I prefer using a laptop over a mobile phone. It's much more convenient. >> Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> I prefer using a laptop over a mobile phone. it is much more convenient. >>

samples.question: How often do you check your social media accounts?
samples.transcript: >> I check my social media accounts very frequently. after I wake up or and anytime throughout the day, I check it really a lot.
samples.transcript_original: >> I check my social media accounts very frequently. Uh after I wake up or and anytime throughout the day, I check it really a lot.

samples.question: >> Has technology changed the way you study or work?
samples.transcript: >> Technology has made the way I study and work a lot more efficient than it would be if I had not technology access.
samples.transcript_original: >> Technology has made the way I study and work a lot more efficient than it would be if I had not technology access.
samples.transcript_cleaned: >> Technology has made the way I study and work a lot more efficient than it would be if I had not technology access.

samples.question: Do you think people rely too much on technology nowadays?
samples.transcript: >> People do rely a lot on technology nowadays than they used to before. it is incorporated in every aspects of their lives. It was not used to it was not like that back in our parents' days or in our grandparents days. it is much more prevalent now.
